Somerville.Gray Gardens East and West Historic Dist: The Gray Gardens East and West Historic District is a historic district encompassing an early 20th century residential subidivision in Cambridge, Massachusetts. The subdivision includes all of the properties on Gray Gardens (East and West), as well as the adjacent 91 Garden Street and 60 Raymond Street. The subdivision was created by a group of interested individuals who sought to control development of one of the last estates in the area to be developed.
